articles.title: The subjective
articles.description: From art to opinions on mundane matters…
articles.contents:
In this site, Pratik Bhandari writes his provisional thoughts and opinions, experiences, and some facts. Opinions change.
Check his poetry and art as well.

















academic portfolio google scholar researchgate twitter(@prbhx) github linkedin

articles.title: Academics
articles.contents:
As a PhD student at Saarland University, I study cognitive processes of human lanugage comprehension. Prior to this, I’ve worked on metacognition, bilingual language processing, (un)conscious visual processing, and language-attention interplay. I was a clinical audiologist and a speech-language pathologist before entering academia.
Click here for more about my academic and research work.
